original_text: And the waters returned from off the earth continually: and after the end of the hundred and fifty days the waters were abated.
korean_text: 물이 땅에서 물러가고 점점 물러가서 백오십 일 후에 줄어들고

sentences.original_text: And waters returned from off the earth continually
and after the end of hundred and fifty days
